page.title: 12Gt.Waldingfield V.C.P School
page.content: The school was built in 1970 by Kingsbury Builders from Boxford.There are no classrooms with doors,but teaching areas.This is called an Open Plan.There are 4 teachers and about 100 children from 5-9 years old.We have a secretary who comes in mornings only. She also runs the Watch club.We have 2 cooks and 2 helpers when we have dinner.About half of the children stay for dinner and most of the others stay for packed lunch.The school has a hall where we have assembly,P.E.and singing.There are 2 quiet rooms and in the grounds there is quite a large pond.There is a fence round the school.
